mapper.select: SELECT p.image, p.product_no, p.product_name,DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(p.product_detail) AS product_detail,p.price,c.product_count,(p.price*c.product_count) AS total FROM juiceta_cart c INNER JOIN juiceta_product p ON c.product_no=p.product_no WHERE id=#{value}
SELECT SUM(p.price*c.product_count) AS cart_total FROM juiceta_cart c INNER JOIN juiceta_product p ON c.product_no=p.product_no WHERE id=#{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM juiceta_wishlist WHERE id=#{ID} AND product_no=#{PRODUCT_NO}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM juiceta_cart WHERE id=#{ID} AND product_no=#{PRODUCT_NO}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM juiceta_cart WHERE id=#{value}
select p.product_no, product_name, p.price, p.product_detail, p.image, p.category from juiceta_product p inner join juiceta_wishlist w on p.product_no = w.product_no where w.id =#{value}
